front.title: American Standard Guide to s AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis and a Total Current Basis

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: These specifications apply to all indoor and outdoor types of ac high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 volts. This document is issued only as a guide for use in compiling specifications for ac high-voltage circuit breakers. The imperative mode of the language is illustrative of that used in specifications. It does not imply that this document is anything other than advisory in its scope.
